review:
We are consulting Dr keertana Reddy mam since starting of our pregnancy. She listens to our queries and needs patiently. She is available for her patients even in emergencies

She waited for MY NORMAL DELIVERY for more than two days and she there although it . We are very impressed with all the facilities including NICU and spl thanks to Dr shashidhar for his expertise and treatment.

Thanks to all the supporting staff Special thanks to MR IMRAN , he was there every time we needed something regarding to every our queries and needs.

Feeling very happy and Recommend every one to visit GREENMED HOSPITALüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy Exercise,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
Visit to Green Med Hospital for Pre-Pregnancy consultations, regular Pregnancy Check Ups, labour and delivery admissions and procedures, Post Delivery Care Maternal Care, and care for newborn baby daughter.
 
Pre-Pregnancy/ Pregnancy Check-Ups and Consultations:
Dr. Keertana Reddy was right from the beginning helpful during pre-pregnancy consultations. She was through about our concerns and explained everything in detail. She did not prescribe too much of medications both before and during pregnancy. As it neared the final month of pregnancy, certain complications were observed for which detailed explanation was given by Dr. Reddy.
 
Labor and Delivery:
On April 18, 2024, our baby girl was born. She had complications of respiratory distress, but Dr. T. Shashidhar and the NICU staff acted and cared for her very swiftly and made sure she got the best possible care. Dr. Shashidhar's availability and periodic updates offered reassurance during tense times.
 
Labour pains, delivery admissions and post-delivery Care:
I would like to thank the support staff of Green Med Hospital, especially Shri Imran, who was available always to help us. Also, the entire staff from on call DMO, nurses and other supporting staff because of whom the entire journey went smoothly. They treated my wife and baby like family. The rooms were always clean, and the hygiene was maintained regularly.
 
Prenatal Yoga:
Special thanks to Dr. Asha, who conducted weekly prenatal yoga classes. It was immensely helpful to my wife benefitted to manage her pregnancy well.
 
Overall Experience:
Do visit Green Med Hospital for pregnancy and pediatric care. Finally, a big thanks to Dr. Keertana Reddy and Dr. T Shashidhar for giving us our bundle of joy. The arrival of our daughter has made the world feel smaller. Thank you.

review: A doctor who is perfect with her work and clear in her goal. Dr. Keerthana is the only doctor who was prompt in diagnosis of my case with a well defined treatment plan. Having been to several hospitals and wasting my precious time and money, I had no hopes of finding a Best doctor for myself. But when I consulted Dr.Keerthana, she explained the issue and readly took up my case with no hesitation. Not wasting any time in unnecessary investigations, she started the treatment and the results prove her perfection. I conceived within few months and now waiting for my little miracle to arrive. I am continuing my journey with her treatment. I undoubtedly recommend Dr. Keerthana for any gynaecology related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** **** **** ** ******* *** ******* *** ***** ***** ** ****** *** ************** *** ********** **** ** ****** *** **** ** ******** ** ****** ***** *** ******* * ***** *********. One unexpected appointment with Dr.Keerthana, was a miracle in our lives. She diagnosed the issue immediately and started the treatment and soon we had our dream come true. My wife conceived. She continues to guide us through our pregnancy journey. Dr.Shashi, always available to clear any doubts you may have, regarding your yet to be born baby. I strongly recommend Green Meds hospital for any gynaecology or paediatric issue.

review: Me and my husband were very concerned about selecting gynaecologist for my first pregnancy..we had heard that doctors prefer caesarean over normal delivery now-a-days...but Dr keerthana she guided us best throughout my pregnancy...she didn't prescribe unnecessary medications... although my afi was low but she helped me deliver my baby normally using induced pain....I would highly recommend the couples to visit her for their pregnancy.... thank you keerthana ma'am for all your support ..
